topic.title: Installation Guide
topic.shortdesc: Detailed instructions for installing the SmartHome Hub.

body.p: The installation process for the SmartHome Hub is designed to be straightforward and user-friendly. Before you begin, ensure you have the following items:

ul.li: SmartHome Hub device and power adapter
Ethernet cable (if opting for a wired connection)
Access to your home Wi-Fi network
Smartphone or tablet for initial setup

ol.li: Unpack: Remove the device and accessories from the packaging. Inspect the device for any physical damage.
Connect Power: Plug the power adapter into the Hub and then into a wall outlet. Ensure the LED indicator turns on.
Network Setup: For a wired connection, connect the Ethernet cable from the Hub to your router. For wireless, proceed to the next step.
Download App: Install the SmartHome mobile app from the App Store or Google Play.
Initial Configuration: Open the app, create or sign into your account, and follow the on-screen prompts. The app will guide you through pairing the Hub with your network.
Final Checks: Once setup is complete, verify that all connected devices are recognized and properly configured.

body.p: Tips: If you experience connectivity issues, try repositioning the Hub to ensure it is within range of your router. Consult the troubleshooting section for additional guidance.
